page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TRISTAN
page.content: {(By Tristan Watts aged 10)}Last Satur- day morning I woke and switched on the TV until breakfast. When I had finish- ed breakfast Mum and my sister went into town. A bit later I went up to the shop to buy a{Father's Day card for{Dad,}and some{wrapping paper.}When I got home I had to creep past Dad who was painting the garage. He said{"Why {are you making a crackling noise?"}I answered that I had bought a new pen for school! I went in and wrapped my present for Dad, and I had to hide it somewhere.{Mum}came home and we had lunch.{My sister Verity}had a{ballet {exam}on that day too,so after lunch we went to the Village Hall. There we dr- opped off Verity and Mum,and Dad and I went to the{Cub Sports}at the Elize Hele School. I was in three races. Overall we came third.That evening Mum and Dad had a{dinner party}at home.
